title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2001 to 2002, roughly constant from 2002 to 2003, slightly increasing from 2003 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2006, slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 600.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 136.0 was recorded at Year 2001
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars with a total of 18 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2018 to 2001.
